parameters.name: ClusterCategory
parameters.description: The edition of the MySQL analytic instance.

parameters.name: ClusterMode
parameters.description: The mode of the MySQL analytic instance.

parameters.name: NodeClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the MySQL analytic instance.

parameters.name: NodeCount
parameters.description: The number of nodes in the MySQL analytic instance.

parameters.name: RdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the ApsaraDB RDS instance from which data is synchronized to the MySQL analytic instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~143074~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description: The storage type of the MySQL analytic instance.
